$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/emoji-dropdown.title: $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/emoji-dropdown
$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/emoji-dropdown.text:
<$tiddler tiddler="$:/xp/emoji-button/emoji-dropdown/text">
<$radio field="text" value="""{{$:/xp/emoji-button/emoji-dropdown/font}}"""> Font </$radio> 
<$radio field="text" value="""{{$:/xp/emoji-button/emoji-dropdown/unicode}}"""> Unicode </$radio> 
<$radio field="text" value="""{{$:/xp/emoji-button/emoji-dropdown/css3}}"""> CSS3 </$radio>
</$tiddler>

{{$:/xp/emoji-button/emoji-dropdown/text}}

The Font Emoji Characters.title: The Font Emoji Characters
The Font Emoji Characters.list: [[The Font Emoji Characters/smileys-people]] [[The Font Emoji Characters/animals-nature]] [[The Font Emoji Characters/food-drink]] [[The Font Emoji Characters/activity]] [[The Font Emoji Characters/travel-places]] [[The Font Emoji Characters/objects]] [[The Font Emoji Characters/symbols]] [[The Font Emoji Characters/flags]] [[The Font Emoji Characters/twitter]]
The Font Emoji Characters.text:
//Click an emoji to copy to the clipboard!//

<<tabs "[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[The Font Emoji Characters]]" "The Font Emoji Characters/smileys-people" "$:/state/tab/unicode-emoji">>


;Emoji meanings:
* [ext[https://emojipedia.org/]]
* [ext[https://emojixd.com/]]

;Display of emoji in different OS may be seen here:
* [ext[http://apps.timwhitlock.info/emoji/tables/unicode]] 
* [ext[http://www.unicode.org/emoji/charts/emoji-style.html]]
* [ext[http://getemoji.com/]]

$:/xp/emoji-button/macros/emoji-picker.title: $:/xp/emoji-button/macros/emoji-picker
$:/xp/emoji-button/macros/emoji-picker.text:
\define copyEmojiActions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" $param=<>/> \define insertEmojiActions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-text-operation" $param="replace-selection" text=<>/> \define emoji-picker-thumbnail(actions) <$button tag="a"> $(emoji-picker-update-recent)$ $actions$ $(emoji-picker-value)$ \end \define emoji-picker-list(filter,actions) <$list filter="""$filter$""" variable="emoji-picker-value"> <$macrocall $name="emoji-picker-thumbnail" actions="""$actions$"""/> \end \define emoji-picker-thumbnail-recent(actions) <$button tag="a"> $(emoji-picker-update-recent)$ $actions$ $(emoji-picker-value)$ \end \define emoji-picker-update-recent() <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/config/EmojiPicker/Recent" $subfilter="$(emoji-picker-value)$ [list[$:/config/EmojiPicker/Recent]remove[$(emoji-picker-value)$]] +[limit[36]]" /> \end \define emoji-picker-recent-inner(actions) <$set name="emoji-picker-value" value="$(recentEmoji)$"> <$macrocall $name="emoji-picker-thumbnail-recent" actions="""$actions$"""/> \end \define emoji-picker-recent(actions)
Recent:
<$list filter="[list[$:/config/EmojiPicker/Recent]]" variable="recentEmoji"> <$macrocall $name="emoji-picker-recent-inner" actions="""$actions$"""/>
\end

$:/xp/emoji-button/macros/unicode-emoji-.title: $:/xp/emoji-button/macros/unicode-emoji-picker
$:/xp/emoji-button/macros/unicode-emoji-.text:
\define copyEmojiActions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" $param=<>/> \define insertEmojiActions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-text-operation" $param="replace-selection" text=<>/> \define unicode-emoji-picker-thumbnail(actions) <$button tag="a" tooltip="""$(emoji-picker-value)$"""> $(unicode-emoji-picker-update-recent)$ $actions$ $(emoji-picker-value)$ \end \define unicode-emoji-picker-list(filter,actions) <$list filter="""$filter$""" variable="emoji-picker-value"> <$macrocall $name="unicode-emoji-picker-thumbnail" actions="""$actions$"""/> \end \define unicode-emoji-picker-thumbnail-recent(actions) <$button tag="a" tooltip="""$(emoji-picker-value)$"""> $(unicode-emoji-picker-update-recent)$ $actions$ $(emoji-picker-value)$ \end \define unicode-emoji-picker-update-recent() <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/config/UnicodeEmojiPicker/Recent" $subfilter="$(emoji-picker-value)$ [list[$:/config/UnicodeEmojiPicker/Recent]remove[$(emoji-picker-value)$]] +[limit[36]]" /> \end \define unicode-emoji-picker-recent-inner(actions) <$set name="emoji-picker-value" value="$(recentEmoji)$"> <$macrocall $name="unicode-emoji-picker-thumbnail-recent" actions="""$actions$"""/> \end \define unicode-emoji-picker-recent(actions)
Recent:
<$list filter="[list[$:/config/UnicodeEmojiPicker/Recent]]" variable="recentEmoji"> <$macrocall $name="unicode-emoji-picker-recent-inner" actions="""$actions$"""/>
\end

$:/xp/emoji-button/readme.title: $:/xp/emoji-button/readme
$:/xp/emoji-button/readme.text:
A button ({{$:/core/images/emoji}}) for inserting emojis.
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/emoji}}
